title: NewsBreak- Sterling Rises After Tusk Says Johnson Has Promised Brexit Solution
text:
NewsBreak- Sterling Rises After Tusk Says Johnson Has Promised Brexit Solution

Forex 4 hours ago (Oct 11, 2019 20:09)

© Reuters. Investing.com - The pound rose on Friday after European Council President Donald Tusk said that U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson has promised to deliver a Brexit solution "that works for all". The news comes after unconfirmed reports suggesting that Johnson had dropped his insistence that Northern Ireland remain in the U.K. customs area after Brexit. • Tusk also said however that so far the U.K. has not come forward with a realistic proposal. • If there is no proposal released today, than Tusk will announce that there is no more chance of a deal at next week’s summit. • gained 0.3% to 1.2482 as of 4:56 AM ET (8:56 GMT). • fell 0.3% to 0.8814.

NewsBreak- Sterling Rises After Tusk Says Johnson Has Promised Brexit Solution
